```{=html}
<nav id="dev-nav">
  <div class="nav nav-tabs" id="nav-tab" role="tablist">
    <button
      class="nav-link"
      id="tab-1"
      data-bs-toggle="tab"
      data-bs-target="#tab-content-1"
      type="button"
      role="tab"
      aria-controls="tab-content-1"
      aria-selected="true"
    >
      <i class="bi bi-server"></i>
      <text>Server</text>
    </button>
    <button
      class="nav-link active"
      id="tab-2"
      data-bs-toggle="tab"
      data-bs-target="#tab-content-2"
      type="button"
      role="tab"
      aria-controls="tab-content-2"
      aria-selected="true"
    >
      <i class="bi bi-bookshelf"></i>
      <text>Quarto</text>
    </button>
    <button
      class="nav-link"
      id="tab-3"
      data-bs-toggle="tab"
      data-bs-target="#tab-content-3"
      type="button"
      role="tab"
      aria-controls="tab-content-3"
    >
      <i class="bi bi-ui-checks-grid"></i>
      <text>Controls</text>
    </button>
  </div>
</nav>
```

::: { #tab-content-3 .tab-pane }

```{=html}
<div id="api-params" class="overlay overlay-blur">
  <div class="overlay-content">
    <div class="overlay-content-item" data-key="render">

      <h4 class="my-5">Render By URL</h4>
      <div id="api-params-render" class="m-3">
        <div class="input-group input-group bg-black my-4">
          <input
            type="text"
            class="form-control bg-dark"
            id="api-params-render-item"
          ></input>
        </div>
        <div class="form-text" id="api-params-render-desc">
          <i class="bi bi-file-earmark"></i>
          Enter the absolute url to the file to re-render.
        </div>
        <div class="form-text text-warning hidden" id="api-params-render-err">
          <i class="bi bi-info-circle"></i>
          The provided value must be a valid path.
        </div>
      </div>

      <button id="api-params-render-button" type="button" class="btn my-5">
        <span class="spinner-border spinner-border-sm hidden" role="status"></span>
        <text>Rerender</text>
      </button>

    </div>

    <div class="overlay-content-item" data-key="get-last">

      <h4 class="my-5">Get Latest</h4>
      <div id="api-params-get-last" class="m-3">
        <div class="input-group input-group bg-black my-4">
          <select class="form-select" id="api-params-get-last-kind">
            <option value="none" selected>Select Render Kind</option>
            <option value="direct">Direct</option>
            <option value="defered">Defered</option>
            <option value="static">Static</option>
          </select>
        </div>
        <div class="form-text text-warning hidden" id="api-params-get-last-err">
          <i class="bi bi-info-circle"></i>
          At least one kind must be selected.
        </div>
      </div>

      <button id="api-params-get-last-button" type="button" class="btn my-5">
        <span class="spinner-border spinner-border-sm hidden" role="status"></span>
        <text>Submit</text>
      </button>

    </div>
  </div>
</div>
<table id="quarto-controls" class="table quarto-controls table-borderless p-2">
  <colgroup>
    <col width="30%">
    <col width="70%">
  </colgroup>
  <thead style="display: none;">
    <tr>
      <td>Button</td>
      <td>About</td>
    </tr>
  </thead>
  <tbody>
    <tr>
      <td>
        <button id="quarto-controls-render-one" type="button" data-key="render" class="btn btn-outline-success">
          <text> Render One</text>
        </button>
      </td>
      <td><text>Render a particular document.</text></td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>
        <button id="quarto-controls-get-last" type="button" data-key="get-last" class="btn btn-outline-success">
          <text> Get Last Rendered</text>
        </button>
      </td>
      <td>
          Get the last item handled (with some parameters).
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>
        <button id="quarto-controls-clear-logs" type="button" class="btn btn-outline-danger">
          <text> Clear Logs</text>
        </button>
      </td>
      <td>
        Clear all historic log data. Does not clear data for the current session.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>
        <button id="quarto-controls-clear-renders" type="button" class="btn btn-outline-danger">
          <text> Clear Renders</text>
        </button>
      </td>
      <td>
        Clear all historic quarto render data. Does not clear data for the current session.
      </td>
    </tr>
  </tbody>
</table>
```

```{=html}
<code class="hidden terminal" id="quarto-controls-response">
</code>
```

::::

```{=html}
<script type="module">
  document.getElementById("title-block-header").remove()
  document.getElementById("quarto-document-content").classList.add("px-1")

  globalThis.serverLog = ServerLog({
    last: 32,
    serverLogContainer: document.querySelector("#live-logs-server tbody"),
    serverLogParent: document.querySelector("#tab-content-1"),
  })

  globalThis.quarto = Quarto({
    last: 32,
    filters: {},
    quartoOverlayControls: Overlay(document.getElementById("quarto-overlay")),
    quartoLogs: document.querySelector("#quarto-live-logs tbody"),
    quartoLogsParent: document.querySelector("#tab-content-2"),
    quartoOverlayContent: document.querySelector('#quarto-overlay-content'),
  })

  const quartoContent = document.getElementById("quarto-content")
  quartoContent.classList.remove("page-columns")

  globalThis.quartoControls = QuartoControls()

</script>
```
